about.title: About Gram Sahayak
about.mission_text: Gram Sahayak (Village Helper) is a voice-first AI assistant designed to bridge the gap between rural citizens and government welfare schemes. We believe every citizen deserves access to the benefits they are entitled to, regardless of their literacy level or language.
about.feature_ai: AI-powered scheme matching and eligibility checking
about.feature_forms: Assisted form filling with voice guidance
about.feature_accessible: Fully accessible — designed for all abilities
about.tech_text: Built with modern microservices architecture, Gram Sahayak uses AI and natural language processing to understand users in their native language and connect them with the right government schemes.
about.contact_text: For support or feedback, reach out to us.
